name: pawned
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
past simple and past participle of
pawn
to leave a possession with a pawnbroker, who gives you money for it and can sell it if the money is not paid back within a certain time: Of all items pawned, jewellery is the most common. Synonym
hock informal
